componentDescription: The foundation for building custom-styled fields.

className.description: Class names applied to the element or a function that returns them based on the component's state.

disabled.description: Whether the field is disabled, adding a disabled style hook to all subcomponents as well as disabling the interactive control inside.

name.description: The field's name, used to identify the field's control in the form.

render.description: A function to customize rendering of the component.

validate.description: Function to custom-validate the field's value. Return a string with an error message if the value is invalid, or null if the value is valid. The function can also return a promise that resolves to a string or null.

validateDebounceMs.description: The debounce time in milliseconds for the validation function for the change phase.

validateOnChange.description: Determines if the validation should be triggered on the change event, rather than only on commit (blur).
